text: Todor Kolev (; August 26, 1939 - February 15, 2013) was a Bulgarian actor, singer, comedian, and television presenter. He appeared in more than 30 movies and more than 50 television shows. Kolev was born on August 26, 1939 in Shumen, Bulgaria. On February 15, 2013, he died in Sofia from lung cancer, aged 73.Почина актьорът Тодор Колев (Bulgarian), Dnevnik.bg, 15 February 2013 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Comedians Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Disease-related deaths in Bulgaria Category:Bulgarian movie actors Category:Bulgarian singers Category:Stage actors Category:Television actors Category:Television presenters Category:Voice actors
title: Todor Kolev (actor)
